body_html:
Hi @asimshankar

Thanks for the response. I took a look at links you sent: step_stats.proto and timeline.py. It might work. Before we go down that path, I'll share with you what information we're collecting in a little more detail.

At first, we want to display in TB:

  1. What percentage of a node is using a tensor cores (using this ratio):
    "duration of kernel(s) using tensor cores" / "duration of all kernels on node".

  2. List of kernels on each node: calls. For each kernel show in a table: total duration, avg duration, max duration, min duration

A screen shot of TB proposal is here: tensorflow/tensorboard#1271

To answer the question as to HOW we're collecting this information: we have access to an internal API whereby we can correlate the tensorcore/kernel information with the nodes in a neural network. We would augment the current TB event file with this information, then update TB to read and display this information.

We're open to any suggestions you have. Thanks,
-Chris

body:
Hi @asimshankar

Thanks for the response.  I took a look at links you sent: step_stats.proto and timeline.py.  It might work.  Before we go down that path, I'll share with you what information we're collecting in a little more detail.

At first, we want to display in TB:
1) What percentage of a node is using a tensor cores (using this ratio): 
"duration of kernel(s) using tensor cores" / "duration of all kernels on node".

2) List of kernels on each node: calls.  For each kernel show in a table: total duration, avg duration, max duration, min duration

A screen shot of TB proposal is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues/1271

To answer the question as to HOW we're collecting this information: we have access to an internal API whereby we can correlate the tensorcore/kernel information with the nodes in a neural network.  We would augment the current TB event file with this information, then update TB to read and display this information.

We're open to any suggestions you have.  Thanks,
-Chris
